meanings.definition: The people who live in a town.
meanings.sent1: The townspeople gathered at the town hall for a meeting.
meanings.sent2: The townspeople enjoy shopping at the local market.
meanings.sent3: The townspeople decided to have a town-wide picnic to celebrate.
meanings.sent4: The townspeople are the heartbeat of the town, keeping it alive and thriving.
meanings.sent5: The townspeople take pride in their community and work together to make it better.

meanings.sent1: Many townspeople attended the annual town festival.
meanings.sent2: The townspeople take care of their homes and gardens.
meanings.sent3: The townspeople organized a bake sale to raise funds for a new playground.
meanings.sent4: The townspeople form a close-knit community, always ready to help each other.
meanings.sent5: The townspeople wave to each other as they pass by on the street, creating a friendly atmosphere.
